features: 【XYJ Brand】Established in 1986, XYJ knives are a leading brand known for their ergonomic and mechanical lever-based design, focusing on providing superior cutting experiences. Our team is dedicated to creating high-quality knives with exceptional sharpness, simple design, great balance and practicality. XYJ knives are not only ideal for outdoor activities such as camping but serve as portable chef knife set for kitchen. Choose XYJ knives for outstanding cutting performance & comfortable handling

【Full Tang Ergonomic Design】XYJ knife features an ergonomic full tang design for improved stability and comfort, providing better balance and durability. It also allows for effortless cutting, reducing strain and fatigue, provides precise cutting control. Reinforce-riveted for sure grip and absolute stability that ensures comfort & maneuverability. Overall, ergonomic handle design for superior hand control, agility, comfort, and stability for effortless and efficient kitchen cutting experience

【Handmade Forging Technology】XYJ knives are sharpened manually by workers with more than 30 years of experience. The blade is forged using a stonewashed and hammer finish treatment, making it tough, wear-resistant, and non-sticking. Compared with traditional knives, XYJ knives can provide a longer service life. The high-quality forged kitchen knife is made by sophisticated operations, including quenching, hammering, tempering, clamping, etc, and a series of continuous operating cycles

【Premium High Carbon Steel】XYJ Knife is forged of high carbon steel with high quality, high hardness and wear resistance. Hand polished edge at per side has an extraordinary performance & a longer service life, helps you cut smoothly with ease. It can easily slice, dice and mince. Hammered texture on the blade not only makes it chic and unique, but makes it anti-sticking. Proper care is required to prevent corrosion, but with regular maintenance, these forged knives will maintain their sharpness

【Convenient To Carry】XYJ knives come with an unique knife sheath ensure your blade is carefully protected while at home, or on the go. A belt loop can be attached to the belt for easy carrying and easy access. Also, XYJ high carbon chef knife is well packaged in an exquisite gift box, which is perfect as a gift to parents, lover, chefs on special days like Thanksgiving Day, New Year, birthdays, Christmas, Halloween, housewarming, and anniversaries, with its outstanding selling points

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Full Tang 6.7 Inch Forging Serbian Chef Knife Kitchen Knife With Leather Sleeves XYJ Knife established in 1986, Yangjiang city, using the ancient Chinese forged craft, makes the blade sharper and more practical, one set can handle all kitchen tasks, helping you to explore your cutting journey. The history of Yangjiang knife making can be traced back to 1400 years ago.

Specifications Size 6.7 inch Blade Thickness 5 mm Blade Width 4.13 inch (105 mm) Blade Length 6.70 Inch (170 mm) Handle Style Full Tang Handle Sheath Material PU Leather Blade Style Straight Edge Blade Material High Carbon Steel Handle Material integrated steel shank + wood + rivet fixing Knife Type Serbian chef Knife, cleaver Application Kitchen cooking, BBQ, hunting and camping Ideal For Cutting meat, dicing vegetables, slicing herbs, or more Unique Sheath The sheath with blet loop for easy carrying and protecting the blade V-Shaped Blade 16-degree edge on each side makes edge sharpness and longer service life Easy to Clean and Maintain Clean the knife with water and a soapy cloth to keep it dry and security after each use Warm Tips Do not heat, freeze, pry or tap the knife, sharpen the knife with a honing steel every 2-3 months

Yangjiang--National Capital of Knives and Scissors The history of knife crafting traced back to 1400 years ago. In the early Qing Dynasty, a large-scale workshop was formed. In the 1930s, Yangjiang knife became famous all over world, exported to more than 100 countries. In the 21st century, won the honor of "National Capital of Knives and Scissors".

Handmade Forged Technology Forged Blade XYJ knives are sharpened manually by workers with more than 30 years of experienceMade by sophisticated operations, including quenching, hammering, tempering, clamping, etc, and a series of continuous operating cyclesCompared with traditional knives, XYJ knives can provide a longer service life Premium Materials XYJ knives are forged by high-manganese steelDesigned with a V-shaped fine processing blade and ergonomic full tang handleProvide a comfortable grip in your hand and are suited for cutting meat, fish, vegetable, fruits or any other food

Feature Full Tang Full tang Ergonomic handle provide a non-slip and comfortable gripTriple-riveted design ensure comfort and maneuverability V-shaped Blade Made of high carbon steel with high quality, high hardness and wear resistant16-degree edge on each side makes edge sharpness and longer service life Leather Knife Sleeves Protect the knife blade, beautiful and more safetyWith belt loop for easy carrying when using outdoor Package Includes XYJ 6.7" Serbian Chef KnifeLeather Knife SheathMini Knife & Mini Knife SheathMini Whetstone with Mini BagGift Box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite kitchen knife
reviews.reviewText: I bought this knife as a treat for myself, because I love cooking and I wanted to upgrade my kitchen tools. I was very impressed with the quality and performance of the knife. It is well-made, sharp, and comfortable to hold.The knife is easy to use and clean. It glides smoothly through food without slipping or dulling. It also has serrated edges that help cut through tough or frozen foods without tearing or breaking them apart. To clean the knife, I just rinse it under running water or wipe it with a damp cloth after each use. I don’t need to use any soap or oil to keep it shiny.I would highly recommend this knife to anyone who loves cooking or wants to improve their skills in the kitchen. It is worth every penny and it will last for years if you take good care of it. It is also a great gift idea for anyone who appreciates quality craftsmanship and performance from their kitchen tools.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful knife with case
reviews.reviewText: This knife was a big hit at Xmas! I bought 4 of them. It works great and is nice and sharp. The handle is comfortable and well made.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great cutting knife
reviews.reviewText: I don't go wild in the kitchen, but I do grill meat and veggies often. This knife is comfy and comes fairly sharp. Good price. Happy customer!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Not only is it super sharp, durable, and handles well. It looks awesome! And you get a super cute little mini knife with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars So far, so good
reviews.reviewText: I haven't had much opportunity to use this, but it is a beautiful knife. Very sharp. I like the forged craftsmanship and sheath it comes with for protection.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All you need
reviews.reviewText: This was a very good buy, the cleaver is super sharp and made very well! Only one con, it took a while for shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this knife for my wife, and she absolutely loves it, it's extremely sharp right out of the box, it's nice and heavy so it doesn't take much effort to chop threw veggies, I would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for Camping
reviews.reviewText: This compact knife is perfectly suited for camping enthusiasts, thanks to its conveniently portable size. It boasts exceptional cutting capabilities, ensuring sharpness that makes any task effortless. Additionally, its ergonomic design guarantees easy handling and optimal control, further enhancing its functionality for outdoor adventures.
Tiene buen filo y es duradero
Was unbelievably happy with the knife. Was way better than I had intended. Was for a gift and the person I gave it to was amazed.
Cuchillo pesado, un filo excelente, si bien no es de forja, pero el precio lo hace una excelente opción
Has some oxidation on it straight out of the box, otherwise is decent and is exactly as shown

So far, so good. Much better than an old professional one I have. Cuts through meat and bone like butter. My mother in law had some doubts but after a few chops, she had little to say and much to cheer!After a few uses, I sharpened it on a wet stone and only took a few seconds for a perfect edge. My favorite use is taking a large steak and chopping until it’s ground perfectly for the grill. Nothing beats a freshly chop/grinded piece of meat for the grilled burger. Of course slicing chunks for individual steaks is great too and it’s like butter doing it with this blade.Highly recommended plus the price is right.
